mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_good_type (type_code, type_name, remark, is_delete, create_user, create_time, version, parent_code) values (#{typeCode}, #{typeName}, #{remark}, 0, #{createUser}, now(), 0, #{parentCode})
mapper.update: update t_sys_good_type set type_name = #{typeName}, remark = #{remark}, version = version + 1, parent_code = #{parentCode}, update_user = #{updateUser}, update_time = now() where type_code = #{typeCode} and is_delete = 0 and version = #{version}
update t_sys_good_type set is_delete = 1, version = version + 1, update_user = #{updateUser}, update_time = now() where type_code = #{typeCode} and is_delete = 0
mapper.select: select type_code typeCode, type_name typeName, remark, parent_code parentCode, version from t_sys_good_type where is_delete = 0 and type_code = #{typeCode}
select type_code typeCode, type_name typeName, remark, version from t_sys_good_type where is_delete = 0 order by type_code

select a.type_code, a.type_name, a.remark, b.type_code twoCode, b.type_name twoName, b.remark twoRemark from t_sys_good_type a left join t_sys_good_type b on a.type_code = b.parent_code and b.is_delete = 0 where a.parent_code = 0 and a.is_delete = 0 order by a.type_code
select type_code typeCode, type_name typeName from t_sys_good_type where is_delete = 0 and parent_code = #{parentCode} order by type_code
select count(parent_code) from t_sys_good_type where is_delete = 0 and parent_code = #{typeCode}
select count(level_one_code) from t_sys_goods where is_delete = 0 and level_one_code = #{typeCode}
select count(level_two_code) from t_sys_goods where is_delete = 0 and level_two_code = #{typeCode}
